ISSUE.TITLE: Get 100 points on Google tools (and other performance tools)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: There are just some minor changes. We're much faster than competitors. We're almost here (almost 100 of 100) =)) 1. https://developers.google.com/speed/pagespeed/insights 2. https://gtmetrix.com/ Right now our internal demo site (4.20) gets 99/100 for mobile and 100/100 for desktop. Several recommendations: 1. Combine images using CSS sprites. For example, /Themes/DefaultClean/Content/images/ajax-loader-small.gif and /Themes/DefaultClean/Content/images/compare-button.png 2. Defer parsing of JavaScript. Actually it's jQuery library that cannot be moved to the footer - https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/issues/2644 3. Use cookie-free domains. For example, /Themes/DefaultClean/Content/images/logo.png or /thumbs/0000077_banner_1.jpg or ...min.css). Let's see whether we can (should) fix them. For example, 1. It's better not to implement point 1 in open-source solution as it'll make customization more complex for third-party developers 2. TODO 3. It can be "fixed" by moving static content to a separate domain (e.g. Azure BLOB) but it's not part of the default solution So the question is what should we fix? Everything is already done (for "out of the box" solution)
